title: Church Secretary - Waterloo, IA (50702)
text:
Church Secretary
Church Secretary
Each one should use whatever gift he has received to serve others, faithfully administering Godâ€™s grace in its various forms. - 1 Peter 4:10
Within the ministry of service to others, the secretary works with the Elders, the Pastor, Church members and attenders, and all who call upon the church office for help.
Office Related Responsibilities and duties:
- Answer incoming phone calls and take messages
- Answer all emails or forward to appropriate people
- Maintain member/attender mailboxes
- Update Sunday docket: bulletin, welcome center and sanctuary slideshow
- Update personal records in Servant Keeper Church database software program
- Make copies as needed by team and ministry chairs
- Record attendance info in Servant Keeper and print reports monthly
- Maintain all office equipment and report to business team chair
- Report all church repairs to business team chair
- Maintain log of facility licenses/inspections (i.e boiler, elevator, extinguishers)
- Order all church supplies
- Open all mail and packages and handle accordingly
- Reconcile credit card statement each month.
- Maintain updated church directory and copy as requested to members
- Distribute flyers, congregational info, etc. as requested
- Maintain monthly church calendar in The Link (prayer requests), on line, and hard copy.
- Maintain a parsonage file of all information regarding the parsonage
- Advise all teams of annual and semi meeting and organize reports
- Create sign-up sheets for teams as needed for church events
- Replenish pews with cards/envelopes/pencils
Office Related Ministry Responsibilities
- Maintain The Link contacts and send out The Link approximately 3X/weekly
- Order flowers or plants for funerals
- Assist with Love Inc. Gap ministry
- Assist with Partners in Education (PIE)
- Call or receive updated info for those sick or hospitalize
